resources.string: There are multiple fights erupting among super-heroes and super-villains. Pick the one you want to bet on and see if you can win.
Powerstats are given for both the fighters. Based on that make a judgement and pick your fighter. If the overall stats of your fighter are better than the opponent , you will win
How to earn the virtual money?
You start with $100, on winning $10 will be added to your balance and on losing $5 will be deducted from your balance
Pull to refresh the home page to load new fights
Mail deeppomal98@gmail.com to give feedback on the app
